sentences.en: A phenomenon supposed to portend good or evil; a prophetic sign.
sentences.cn: 预兆可以预测好坏的一现象; 预兆.

sentences.en: Friends recalled Elisabeth's prophetic words of several years ago.
sentences.cn: 朋友们回想起几年前伊丽莎白预言性的一番话。

sentences.en: Her early achievements were prophetic of her future greatness.
sentences.cn: 她早期的成就预示了她日后卓尔不群.
他那预言性的话吓着了我们.

sentences.en: How prophetic those words have proven to be.
I can't understand the contents of this prophetic book at all.
sentences.cn: 我一点也看不懂这本图谶的内容.

sentences.en: It is under this weight that a prophetic religion becomes essential.
sentences.cn: 正是在这重压下,先知宗教(propheticreligion)变得必不可少.

sentences.en: It turned out to be a prophetic piece of journalism.
sentences.cn: 事实证明那则新闻作出了正确的预言。
真是事有凑巧, 吉尔心里想.
事实证明伦德格伦的警告是有先见之明的。

sentences.en: Many added that he looked sublime and prophetic.
sentences.cn: 不少的人还说他显得崇高,像个先知.

sentences.en: Nonetheless, a number of conclusions that he drew were almost prophetic.
sentences.cn: 不过他得出的一些结论还是很有预见性的.

sentences.en: Prophetic people walk into a garden, resist hard malic fragrance.
sentences.cn: 先知们走进园子, 难以抵御苹果的香味.

sentences.en: The crane, on being wounded, said, " Prophetic crow, where now are your auspices? "
sentences.cn: 鹤受了伤, 说道: “ 预言者乌鸦, 这一次你的预兆 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: The prophetic books of the Bible can be but specimens of the prophesyings of that time.
sentences.cn: 《圣经》里的先知书,只不过是当时各种预言的范本罢了.

sentences.en: This is the prophetic aspect which we will look at tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 这是圣经的预言,也是我们的盼望.

trans.tran_en: correctly saying what will happen in the future
